title: SINEDIE (Tesə): the Deathkneel Complex
description: A dark metafictional YA novel for readers of Hesse, Jung, Kafka, and Wittgenstein. Demian is a quirky loner who prefers daydreaming (about an unattainable yoga model) and remaining on the fringes of things. Yet after the mysterious deaths of his girlfriend and favorite teacher, he stumbles into a conspiracy theory and soon finds himself dead center in a secret war between two groups of descendants of an ancient civilization. Soon, despite misgivings of what is being asked of him sounding terribly cliché, Demian tries to "save the day."An introspective, coming-of-age, unprecedented story making use of multiple genres and literary influences, BUY IT NOW and read the first-ever book of its own kind, the anti-YA novel SINEDIE.
author: Henry Marnes
